ayiya, ayi ban api narakama ewun ganata danne…? 2011 pebarawari 1 dina pe.wa. 9:41 ta api maluwata yanakota sithale wewlanawa..eda hodatama wassa..uda maluwe adiya thiyanna ba sithala echcharata..kohoma hari wadagena aawa…ghantare nam gahuwe na oon…api kodu nisa…lamaa nam thun parayi…podi mahathtya nam daha parak da koheda awith…eyala nam gahuwa oon……. 2011 pebarawari 2 dina pe.wa. 7:55 ta eelanga wathawe apith ekka yaman 2011 pebarawari 1 dina pa.wa. 12:02 ta aththatama meka kiyawapuwama mata mara aasa hithuna ban aaye nanginna.marthu mase thama hondama.harine machan…..thayiya deparak wandane…hik….hik….habayi kokakola sin ekanam unge pada sho.mehe inna jappo,thayiyo kala api wage tap ekata kata allala wathura bona un.

dakune muhude walala kalaya elambai athath, ugra malu hingayak danata masa kipayaka sita pawathina nisa paribhogikayo mahath dushkarathawayakata pathwi sitithi.me pradeshawala madal, dhiwara karmikayo mulu dawasa purama muhuda desa balagena malu aayith enathuru kalgewana athara bahudina yathra, dainika yathra, rathri muhudu yana oru karmikayoda kisidu aadayam margayak nomathiwa, kalgewana bawath owhu dinaminata pawasuha.me wakawanuwe nirantharayenma hurulu ayin bahula washayen werala thiruwalata paminima hingawi athi heyin adassi dal dhiwarayinta balaporoththu kadakara ganimata siduwi thibe.

mema sithuwam ha sanketha pilimbaadawa palawi athi widwath matha anuwa gallen wasin asu dutu de yam aakarayakin idiripath kirimata owun thula thibu aashawa, swabhawika lokaye sathun ha gahakola aadiya dakima nisa hatagath uddamaya , thama wasasthana alankara kara ganimata thibu kamaththa, kalaya winodayen gatha kirimata thibu awashyathawa, aahara sapaya ganima sadaha dadayam aragalaya ha bandunu guptha adahas dakwima saha thaman awata wisu sathwayin dadayam kara ganime kamaththa yanadiya mema sithuwamkaranaya sadaha balapa atha.
